General.Name: Tukas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Tukas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of food products in Turkey and internationally. It offers tomato and pepper pastes, dried and grated tomatoes, sauces, spreads, and condiments; roasted and canned products; boiled products; and pickles, ready to serve foods, jams, and olives, as well as catering products. The company sells its products under the Tukas brand name. Tukas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.
General.Address: Caybasi Mah. Izmir Cad. No: 51, Izmir, Turkey, 35880
